name: harmonium
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a musical instrument with a keyboard that makes sounds when metal reeds (= thin pieces) are made to vibrate by air that is forced past them by pressure: The music is being played on a harmonium instead of a piano. A trio of musicians tap out rhythms on tabla drums and a harmonium. Synonym
reed organ
Sanny11/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesA classical singer sat cross-legged, squeezed his ancient harmonium, and composed satirical political ballads on the spot. It's only a lonely-sounding harmonium playing the tune.Singers bellow festive songs accompanied by an amplified harmonium.
